suggestedGuidanceUpdates.suggestion: In library-worker step 5 (full-suite verification), add explicit fallback guidance: when `bun run test` surfaces known unrelated failures, the worker may fall back to package-scoped `cd packages/<pkg> && bun test` and note the fallback in the handoff. This prevents false procedural non-compliance.
suggestedGuidanceUpdates.evidence: Feature os-349-define-resource worker (session 5621425f) had to fall back from `bun test --filter=@outfitter/mcp` to package-local test due to unrelated logging test failures surfacing through root-level filtered runs.

suggestedGuidanceUpdates.suggestion: For features implementing TypeScript overloads or type narrowing, the library-worker procedure should recommend compile-time type assertions outside src/__tests__/ when the package tsconfig excludes test directories. This prevents runtime-only 'type' checks from being treated as compile-time narrowing verification.
suggestedGuidanceUpdates.evidence: Feature os-350-config-optional-schema added a 'type narrowing' test at packages/config/src/__tests__/config.test.ts:1153 that only performs runtime assertions, but packages/config/tsconfig.json excludes src/__tests__/ from type checking.
